svg.text: sociology
The political crimes of the political extortion of
exploitation government are a representational "tip of the
iceberg" in the mechanics of sociological defeatism. The
intrigues of population manipulation and government
megalomania the morass of darkness in the modernity of
communication that represents the actuality of medievalism
in the monarchies of kakistocratic distraction,
deflection, deception, and denial that waste self and
other to the selfishness, defeatism, and annihilation of
narcissism, avarice, and sadism.
The senselessness of political nihilism represented by the
self destruction familiar to addiction, as well as
narcissism, avarice, and sadism. The "christopher wrey"
of "scams, lies, and confidential communication". The
parasitism of annihilation the exemplar of darkness that
tortures the mind and thereby the body.
In modernity, a choice. A subscription unresolved by
purpose and unknown by substance. Slavery elected by
nihilism. The intellectual forfeiture of carelessness
evinced by the recklessness that wastes and discards every
investment at any and every expense to yield self
annihilation.
